channel.title: Can't get on my own server
channel.description:
i can't log onto my own server, i have the runserver.bat file up and running, and i can compile without errors, i am using pimpscape source, and i have jdk 6.0 EE
can someone help me?
edit: dammit, i don't think i was supposed to use the one with EE

item.title: Can't get on my own server
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

when you run the server it should say something like this:

Starting Testscape on port number 43594

Or Another number, just look for it and try that.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get on my own server

item.title: Can't get on my own server
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Is it saying in the console “Checking if server is still online …” because if it is, use a different IP than 127.0.0.1 that connects to localhost. Something like 192.168.1.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Can't get on my own server
item.dc:creator: @teh_hacker teh_hacker
item.description:
@teh_hacker wrote:

i am, i also tried creating a hamachi network and using my hamachi ip, 5.59.99.5, and using localhost, but nothing works, any explanation?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 01:43:42 PM[/size][hr]oh, this is the coding in my compile, does this help?

@echo off
title Pimpscape Compiler
javac *.java
pause

and this is the code in my runserver

@echo off
title EyreScapeV2 Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

and my jdk path is C:\sun\sdk\jdk

Read full topic
